#summary The rel="feed" attribute indicates that the referenced document is a syndication feed.
#labels about-html,is-html-attribute,from-whatwg

`rel="feed"` is one of several [LinkTypes link types] for describing relationships between documents.

== Usage ==

== Elements ==

You can use the `rel="feed"` attribute on these elements:

  * [AElement <a>]
  * [LinkElement <area>]

== Browser compatibility ==

|| *Test* || *IE8* || *IE7* || *FF3* || *FF2* || *Saf3* ||

== Further reading ==

  * [http://www.whatwg.org/specs/web-apps/current-work/#feed The rel="feed" link type in HTML 5]
